content.content: Matt this probably happened in RWA discussions with Maker but who actually pays Maarten ? and what jurisdiction was this documentation executed? (Cayman Islands?) I see the statutory trust is in Deleware but I thought RWA International was in the Cayman Islands. Just trying to wrap my head around who is compensating the people and where the statutory jurisdictions are. Thanks in advance.!
GPT-discussion-categories: None of the topics listed match

content.content: At present @Maarten is in an uncompensated role. For now. That will change. TBD if LendCo pays him for his services or the DAO. RE Jurisdiction. Yes, these were executed in the Caymans. RWA International Ltd is a Cayman entity. It is the Trust Sponsor for a Delaware statutory trust.
